title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 346: Featuring Frank Seravalli + Drew Shore
description:
On Episode 346 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Frank Seravalli and Drew Shore. Frank joined (01:03:30) to talk about his domination of the expansion draft, NHL free agency, some rumors he is hearing and more. The guys open the show talking about one of the craziest days in NHL free agency history. Deals were signed and trades were made, and we broke them all down. The guys were then joined by Drew Shore (02:27:54) to talk about his recent retirement, becoming an agent and playing with Whit. The guys wrap up the show talking about the recent Jack Eichel situation and what is next for Buffalo and their captain.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
